phrs.translation: 微图画家, 微型图画绘制者, 纤细画家

sentences.sentence: The miniaturist from Edinburgh has made his hobby a full-time career, creating hand-crafted pieces including mini everyday household items such as mini shaving brush and razor and kitchenware.
sentences.translation: 这位来自爱丁堡的微雕艺术家已经把这个爱好当成了自己的事业来经营，他制作了很多日用品微型作品，比如微型剃须刷、剃刀和厨房用具等。
